statements: SELECT * FROM TelehealthBillingData WHERE bill_id = 1001;
SELECT patient_name, service_cost FROM TelehealthBillingData WHERE payment_status = True;
SELECT service_description FROM TelehealthBillingData WHERE service_cost > 500.00;
SELECT * FROM TelehealthBillingData ORDER BY bill_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, service_cost, payment_status FROM TelehealthBillingData WHERE service_cost < 100.00 AND payment_status = False;
SELECT * FROM TelehealthBillingData WHERE service_cost > 1000 ORDER BY bill_id DESC;
SELECT bill_id, patient_name, payment_status FROM TelehealthBillingData WHERE payment_status = TRUE AND service_cost < 500;
SELECT patient_name, service_description FROM TelehealthBillingData WHERE service_description LIKE '%consultation%' AND payment_status = FALSE;
SELECT AVG(service_cost) AS avg_cost, COUNT(*) AS total_bills FROM TelehealthBillingData;
SELECT MAX(service_cost) AS max_cost, MIN(service_cost) AS min_cost FROM TelehealthBillingData WHERE payment_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM telehealth_billing_data ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, billing_amount FROM telehealth_billing_data WHERE payment_status='Pending';
SELECT * FROM telehealth_billing_data WHERE billing_amount >= 1000;
SELECT patient_name, billing_amount FROM telehealth_billing_data WHERE billing_amount < 500 ORDER BY billing_amount ASC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM telehealth_payment_data ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, billing_amount, payment_status FROM telehealth_billing_data WHERE payment_status = 'Paid';
SELECT payment_id, patient_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM telehealth_payment_data ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT patient_name, billing_amount FROM telehealth_billing_data WHERE billing_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM telehealth_payment_data WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payment FROM telehealth_payment_data GROUP BY patient_id HAVING total_payment > 5000;
SELECT * FROM telehealth_billing ORDER BY service_description DESC;
SELECT patient_id, service_date, service_cost FROM telehealth_billing WHERE service_cost > 100;
SELECT * FROM telehealth_payment WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND payment_amount < 500;
SELECT patient_id, invoice_date, total_amount_due FROM telehealth_invoice WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT patient_id, service_date, service_description, service_cost FROM telehealth_billing WHERE service_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM telehealth_billing ORDER BY service_date DESC, service_cost ASC;
SELECT service_description, service_cost FROM telehealth_billing WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT invoice_id, total_amount_due FROM telehealth_invoice WHERE total_amount_due > 5000;
SELECT patient_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM telehealth_payment GROUP BY patient_id HAVING total_payments > 1000;
SELECT t1.*, t2.payment_amount FROM telehealth_billing t1 LEFT JOIN telehealth_payment t2 ON t1.patient_id = t2.patient_id ORDER BY t1.service_date ASC, t2.payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, specialty FROM patients p JOIN doctors d ON p.patient_id = d.doctor_id;
SELECT patient_name, payment_amount FROM patients p JOIN payments pym ON p.patient_id = pym.patient_id WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors ORDER BY specialty DESC;
SELECT patient_name, doctor_name, appointment_date FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM payments WHERE payment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM telehealth_patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM telehealth_patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM telehealth_appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT service_name, service_price FROM telehealth_services WHERE service_price > 100;

SELECT patient_name, appointment_date, total_amount FROM telehealth_patients JOIN telehealth_appointments ON telehealth_patients.patient_id = telehealth_appointments.patient_id JOIN telehealth_invoices ON telehealth_appointments.appointment_id = telehealth_invoices.appointment_id;
SELECT * FROM telehealth_patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_email FROM telehealth_patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT appointment_type, appointment_date FROM telehealth_appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT service_name, service_price FROM telehealth_services WHERE service_price > 100.00;

SELECT patient_name, appointment_date, total_amount FROM telehealth_patients JOIN telehealth_appointments ON telehealth_patients.patient_id = telehealth_appointments.patient_id JOIN telehealth_invoices ON telehealth_appointments.appointment_id = telehealth_invoices.appointment_id WHERE total_amount > 200.00 ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
